explanation.rules:
Umbu-Ungu Numerals: 
1 | telu
2 | talu
3 | yepoko
12 | rurepo
16 | malapu
20 | supu
24 | tokapu
28 | alapu
32 | Polangipu
24 | tokapu
48 = 24 × 2 | tokapu talu 
72 = 24 × 3 | tokapu yepoko 
α ~ β := (α - 4) + β, α ∈ {12, 16, 20, 24, 28, 32}, β ∈ {1, 2, 3} | α -nga β 
γ + δ, γ = 24k, k ∈ {1, 2, 3}, 9 ≤ δ ≤ 32, δ ≠ 24 | γ δ
